services-subtitle: Here is what we offer you
services-description-1: Weekly/bi-monthly mowing, maintenance of flowerbeds, leaf blowing and trimming of hedges and shrubs.
services-description-2: Paving, wooden terraces, laying of fences, creation of lawns and upgrading of the garden.
services-description-3: Realization of sketches, hedges, flowerbeds, flower boxes and indoor plants.
services-description-4: Winter pruning (fruit trees, trees, etc.), pruning of dead branches, felling throughout the year and trimming.
